page.title: 01The General Area.
page.content: The area around Newton Poppleford, Colaton Raleigh and the western side of Sidmouth is one of outstanding beauty.It is near the sea with it's pebble and sandy beaches,rocks and red sandstone cliffs.The land is mainly agricultural with rolling hills and valleys, wild morland and the river Otter flowing to Budleigh Salterton. The villages of Colaton Raleigh and Newton Poppleford are picturesque,both having a few thatched cottages.The main Sidmouth to Exeter road runs through the centre of Newton Poppleford which is now an expanding area with new houses being Built there.
